languages.text: "Как можешь ты описывать неизбежную гибель своих и моих сородичей словом "весело"? Позволишь этому случиться, оставишь все, как есть, и в будущем твои владения наводнят реки крови. Не только Детей Азуриана — твоих подданных также ждет печальный конец. Твои миры, твой протекторат. И я... не могу этого допустить. Пришла моя очередь спасать тебя и твой народ".

traits.locale_text: "Как можешь ты описывать неизбежную гибель своих и моих сородичей словом "весело"? Позволишь этому случиться, оставишь все, как есть, и в будущем твои владения наводнят реки крови. Не только Детей Азуриана — твоих подданных также ждет печальный конец. Твои миры, твой протекторат. И я... не могу этого допустить. Пришла моя очередь спасать тебя и твой народ".
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: "How can you describe the inevitable demise of your and my own kind so nonchalantly? If you let this happen and leave things as they stand, rivers of blood will flood your demesne. Not only will the Children of Asuryan die, your subjects will also meet a terrible end. So will your worlds and your entire protectorate. And I... cannot allow this. It is my turn to rescue you and your people."
languages.original_text: "Как можешь ты описывать неизбежную гибель своих и моих сородичей словом "весело"? Позволишь этому случиться, оставишь все, как есть, и в будущем твои владения наводнят реки крови. Не только Детей Азуриана — твоих подданных также ждет печальный конец. Твои миры, твой протекторат. И я... не могу этого допустить. Пришла моя очередь спасать тебя и твой народ".

traits.locale_text: "How can you describe the inevitable demise of your and my own kind with the word 'merry'? If you let this happen and leave things as they stand, your entire demesne will be drowned in blood. Not only the Children of Asuryan will die, your subjects will also meet a terrible end. So will your worlds and your entire protectorate. And I... I can prevent this. It is my turn to rescue you and your people."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

traits.locale_text: "How can you describe the inevitable demise of your and my own kind with the word 'merry'? If you let this happen and leave things as they stand, your entire demesne will be drowned in blood. Not only the Children of Asuryan will die, your subjects will also meet a terrible end. So will your worlds and your entire protectorate. And I... I can prevent this. It is my turn to rescue you and your people."

If you let this happen and leave things as they stand, rivers of blood will flood your demesne. Not only will the Children of Asuryan die, your subjects will also meet a terrible end. So will your worlds and your entire protectorate. And I... cannot allow this. It is my turn to rescue you and your people."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: «¿Cómo puedes describir la inevitable extinción de nuestras especies con esa ligereza? Si dejas que esto ocurra y no mueves un dedo para evitarlo, correrán ríos de sangre por tus dominios. No solo morirán los hijos de Asuryan; tus súbditos también hallarán una muerte espantosa, como también tus mundos y todo tu protectorado. Y yo... no puedo permitirlo. Ahora me toca a mí rescataros a ti y a los tuyos».
languages.original_text: "How can you describe the inevitable demise of your and my own kind so nonchalantly? If you let this happen and leave things as they stand, rivers of blood will flood your demesne. Not only will the Children of Asuryan die, your subjects will also meet a terrible end. So will your worlds and your entire protectorate. And I... cannot allow this. It is my turn to rescue you and your people."

traits.locale_text: «¿Cómo puedes describir la inevitable extinción de nuestras especies con esa ligereza? Si dejas que esto ocurra y no mueves un dedo para evitarlo, correrán ríos de sangre por tus dominios. No solo morirán los hijos de Asuryan; tus súbditos también hallarán una muerte espantosa, como también tus mundos y todo tu protectorado. Y yo... no puedo permitirlo. Ahora me toca a mí rescataros a ti y a los tuyos».
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: “你我族群之间将会爆发不可避免的伤亡，你怎么能这么轻描淡写地谈论这件事情呢？如果你任由这件事发生，坐视不管，你的领地将会血流成河。不仅阿苏焉之子会死，你的臣民、你的世界和你的王朝也会遭受可怕的结局。我……我不能允许这种事情发生。现在，轮到我来拯救你和你的族人了。”
languages.original_text: "How can you describe the inevitable demise of your and my own kind so nonchalantly? If you let this happen and leave things as they stand, rivers of blood will flood your demesne. Not only will the Children of Asuryan die, your subjects will also meet a terrible end. So will your worlds and your entire protectorate. And I... cannot allow this. It is my turn to rescue you and your people."

traits.locale_text: “你我族群之间将会爆发不可避免的伤亡，你怎么能用‘高兴’这个词来形容？如果你任由这件事发生，坐视不管，你的领地将会血流成河。不仅阿苏焉之子会死，你的臣民、你的世界和你的王朝也会遭受可怕的结局。我……我不能允许这种事情发生。现在，轮到我来拯救你和你的族人了。”
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: « Comment pouvez-vous qualifier de "divertissant" le massacre inévitable de votre peuple et du mien ? Si vous ne faites rien, des rivières de sang inonderont votre domaine. Ce ne sont pas seulement les enfants d'Asuryan qui mourront ; vos sujets connaîtront eux aussi une fin terrible, tout comme vos mondes et l'ensemble de votre protectorat. Et je... ne peux le permettre. C'est à mon tour de vous sauver, vous et les vôtres. »
languages.original_text: "How can you describe the inevitable demise of your and my own kind so nonchalantly? If you let this happen and leave things as they stand, rivers of blood will flood your demesne. Not only will the Children of Asuryan die, your subjects will also meet a terrible end. So will your worlds and your entire protectorate. And I... cannot allow this. It is my turn to rescue you and your people."

traits.locale_text: « Comment pouvez-vous qualifier de "divertissant" le massacre inévitable de votre peuple et du mien ? Si vous ne faites rien, des rivières de sang inonderont votre domaine. Ce ne sont pas seulement les enfants d'Asuryan qui mourront ; vos sujets connaîtront eux aussi une fin terrible, tout comme vos mondes et l'ensemble de votre protectorat. Je... ne peux pas le permettre. C'est à mon tour de vous sauver, vous et les vôtres. »
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: 「お前たちと私の同族の避けられない滅亡を、どうしてそんなに淡々と説明できるのだ？このまま事態を放置すれば、お前の領地には血の川が溢れるだろう。アシュリアンの御子らが死ぬだけでなく、お前の臣民も恐ろしい結末を迎えるだろう。お前の世界も、保護領全体もだ。そして私は…これを許すことはできない 私がお前とその民を救う番だ」
languages.original_text: "How can you describe the inevitable demise of your and my own kind so nonchalantly? If you let this happen and leave things as they stand, rivers of blood will flood your demesne. Not only will the Children of Asuryan die, your subjects will also meet a terrible end. So will your worlds and your entire protectorate. And I... cannot allow this. It is my turn to rescue you and your people."

traits.locale_text: 「お前たちと私の同族の避けられない滅亡を、『愉快』という言葉でどう表現できる？このまま事態を放置すれば、お前の領地には血の川が溢れるだろう。アシュリアンの御子らが死ぬだけでなく、お前の臣民も恐ろしい結末を迎えるだろう。お前の世界も、保護領全体もだ。そして私は…これを許すことはできない 私がお前とその民を救う番だ」
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: "Wie könnt Ihr den unvermeidlichen Niedergang Eurer und meiner eigenen Spezies mit derart saloppen Worten beschreiben? Wenn Ihr das zulasst und die Dinge so belasst, wie sie sind, werden Ströme aus Blut Euer Reich fluten. Nicht nur die Kinder von Asuryan werden sterben, auch Eure Untertanen werden ein schreckliches Ende finden. Genau wie Eure Welten und Euer gesamtes Protektorat. Und ich .. kann das nicht zulassen. Nun bin ich an der Reihe, nun muss ich Euch und Euer Volk retten."
languages.original_text: "How can you describe the inevitable demise of your and my own kind so nonchalantly? If you let this happen and leave things as they stand, rivers of blood will flood your demesne. Not only will the Children of Asuryan die, your subjects will also meet a terrible end. So will your worlds and your entire protectorate. And I... cannot allow this. It is my turn to rescue you and your people."

traits.locale_text: "Wie könnt Ihr den unvermeidlichen Niedergang Eurer und meiner eigenen Spezies als 'besser' bezeichnen?" Wenn Ihr das zulasst und die Dinge so belasst, wie sie sind, werden Ströme aus Blut Euer Reich fluten. Nicht nur die Kinder von Asuryan werden sterben, auch Eure Untertanen werden ein schreckliches Ende finden. Genau wie Eure Welten und Euer gesamtes Protektorat. Und ich .. kann das nicht zulassen. Nun bin ich an der Reihe, nun muss ich Euch und Euer Volk retten."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader

languages.text: "Senin soydaşlarının da benim soydaşlarımın da kaçınılmaz sona ilerleyişinden nasıl böyle soğukkanlılıkla bahsedersin? Buna müsaade edip her şeyi olduğu gibi bırakırsan yönetimindeki bölgelerde kandan nehirler akar. Yalnızca Asuryan'ın Çocukları ölmez, tebaan da korkunç bir son yaşar. Dünyaların ve tüm protektoran da onları takip eder. Ben... Buna izin veremem. Seni ve halkını kurtarma sırası bende."
languages.original_text: "How can you describe the inevitable demise of your and my own kind so nonchalantly? If you let this happen and leave things as they stand, rivers of blood will flood your demesne. Not only will the Children of Asuryan die, your subjects will also meet a terrible end. So will your worlds and your entire protectorate. And I... cannot allow this. It is my turn to rescue you and your people."

traits.locale_text: "Senin soydaşlarının da benim soydaşlarımın da kaçınılmaz sona ilerleyişinden nasıl böyle soğukkanlılıkla bahsedersin? Buna müsaade edip her şeyi olduğu gibi bırakırsan yönetimindeki bölgelerde kandan nehirler akar. Yalnızca Asuryan'ın Çocukları ölmez, tebaan da korkunç bir son yaşar. Dünyaların ve tüm protektoran da onları takip eder. Ben... Buna izin veremem. Seni ve halkını kurtarma sırası bende."
traits.speaker: Quetza_EldarGuardianDefender_Leader
